text:
This week I was proud to introduce a bill to protect workers laboring in hot conditions, often without even the most basic protections like rest breaks and access to water.

It’s simply unconscionable to allow workers—in particular farm workers—to continue to endure this. https://twitter.com/UFWupdates/status/1311856806172356610 QT @UFWupdates Extreme heat injured and kills farm workers.

Today, @SenKamalaHarris introduced a bill to protect farm workers and outdoor laborers across the country from extreme heat. This bill mirrors California’s regulations that have saved countless lives. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjSmz4hUYAAExA8.jpg

Californians: are you registered to vote? There’s still time to register online if you haven’t already. You can also register to vote in-person on Election Day, November 3.

If you have any questions about voting in our state, be sure to participate in the event below. https://twitter.com/CASOSvote/status/1312108057929805824 QT @CASOSvote If you have questions about voting in CA, we’ll be participating in a nationwide #AskTheElectionOfficials Twitter Q&A on Tuesday, October 6 at 12pm PST.
 
We'll answer as many questions as we can! Tap below or Tweet your question with #AskCASOS.

Don’t let up on wearing a mask, practicing social distancing, and staying indoors as much as possible. Coronavirus is still with us and devastating our communities. Taking these easy steps could save your life. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjbaB7CXsAYEOMG.jpg

Thank you, @MsPaulaWestSF. You are a superstar! -NP http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1312588886779060229/pu/img/8VVrmPSmpNufnWDF.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1312588886779060229/pu/vid/480x270/5RG14Z2fobNGwhzx.mp4?tag=10

It’s time for America to come home to our values. 

We must get back to not simply revering but preserving our Constitution, our beautiful diversity, our environment, and our soul as a nation that is continually invigorated by the aspirations and hard work of new arrivals. #vote http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1312586281319358464/img/j3ubOschl0zkR3p8.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312586281319358464/vid/480x270/441ANp3S1Xc_6GTL.mp4?tag=13

Thank you, Selina Sun, for honoring the memory and legacy of our beloved friend and mayor Edwin M. Lee with the dual focus of @EdLeeDems on kitchen table issues and on the broader fight against hate and for human rights that speaks to #CA12’s beautiful diversity. #TeamPelosi http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1312584996193005572/pu/img/8_s6XLv7ksY677jo.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1312584996193005572/pu/vid/480x270/7Vsr0cjTw47kF0Bj.mp4?tag=10

Listening to Alex Barrett-Shorter @alex_shortea, Co-Chair of SF Young Democrats @sfyd, it’s difficult to be anything but optimistic about America’s future.

Your moral clarity on fighting for what is right is a beacon of hope for us as we sprint to election day. #CA12 #TeamPelosi http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1312584584798916609/pu/img/INlT-7FJ2uD-xp-W.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1312584584798916609/pu/vid/480x270/CdALe_-wC94BxitC.mp4?tag=10

We were thrilled to welcome and thank Ann Merrill and @SwingLeftSF, whose hard work played a key role in our victories in California in 2018 that led to our Democratic House majority at this crucial time for our country. #CA12 #TeamPelosi http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1312583637104287746/pu/img/RVeWV5MnDh4WmbEK.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1312583637104287746/pu/vid/480x270/EwxWUcoz6kva0ZyA.mp4?tag=10

Thank you @Sarah24usa and @SFLatinoDems for your inspiring leadership and impassioned advocacy for all San Franciscans. When we win in November because of your hard work, we will make your American Dream our reality. #CA12 #TeamPelosi http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1312577468738527232/pu/img/pluYf14UewLLO7hu.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1312577468738527232/pu/vid/480x270/Ze0Ud_eiAW4eqEui.mp4?tag=10

One Month To Victory on Nov. 3rd, we could not be in better company than with our dear friend Carolyn Samoa, VP for Paraprofessionals @UESF, our labor family, and a new generation of visionaries who make it easy to believe that our best days are ahead of us. #CA12 #TeamPelosi http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1312546102252646401/img/yGJdTL8hOW1Locpj.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312546102252646401/vid/480x270/PWeX091JBhYPBgg2.mp4?tag=13

Our great friend Rudy Gonzalez, Executive Director of the SF Labor Council @sflabor, let #TeamPelosi tag along with him today as he masked-up and hit the streets to help mobilize our neighbors across #CA12 to get ready to #vote! http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1312530983174967297/img/qxvP9Fdzm7dtGfRW.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312530983174967297/vid/480x270/C8sxuA1R3u5wCB_X.mp4?tag=13

Thank you, @DavidCamposSF, for your poignant reminder that the work that we do today to make our country more just and inclusive is about shaping the future that our children and our children’s children will live in tomorrow. #CA12 #TeamPelosi http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1312521390650806272/img/wBzu-ELW_ep7st9N.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312521390650806272/vid/480x270/t4RNDXUwYtwspR2v.mp4?tag=13

Thank you, @MsPaulawestSF, for blessing us with an inspiring performance of “The Times They Are a-Changin” to kick-off our One Month to Victory mobilization with our VIPS – our volunteers in politics! #CA12 #TeamPelosi http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1312518281073434626/img/ZiS9qVOTb2Uc6a2K.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312518281073434626/vid/480x270/ODilAAkr6HUpvdJt.mp4?tag=13
RT @KamalaHarris One month. Let’s give it our all.

RT @FLSERT Individual Assistance is now available for Floridians impacted by Hurricane #Sally in Escambia, Santa Rosa, Okaloosa, Walton & Bay counties. 

There are three ways to start the application process ⬇️ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjWlC1lXgAs6s2Q.jpg

RT @McConnellPress An old surveying error near Rough River Dam @KYStateParks could've cost Breckinridge County homeowners $4,000. @SenateMajLdr McConnell and @RandPaul secured a provision to protect #Kentucky families from a steep bill. #Bluegrass120 
@k105radio: http://www.k105.com/2018/10/17/delivering-relief-to-rough-river-families/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjWmk3nXcAExCb0.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjWmk4CWAAE5r2F.jpg

At this critical and unprecedented moment in American history, it is absolutely imperative that we stand together and elect Joe Biden as the next president of the United States. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1312485600012890112/img/lXPZLk1YtbBqAbJY.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312485600012890112/vid/480x270/xefEmj4QBzfin26j.mp4?tag=13

There is no question that the economic proposals that Joe Biden is supporting are strong and will go a long, long way in improving life for working families. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1312483768926523392/img/wNtLWtrLE-WMTJ4R.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312483768926523392/vid/480x270/MnK5ajbCMpfpyavS.mp4?tag=13

Over the past four years, the economy has been great for billionaires, and even better for them during this horrific pandemic, but it has been an absolute disaster for working families. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1312478532275060736/img/qHWdEuDszeWMNF4y.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312478532275060736/vid/480x270/EicIl90CyMHvPiTl.mp4?tag=13

Which candidate will be disciplined and responsible in dealing with this pandemic?

Joe Biden.

Which candidate will develop policies based on the advice of the best scientists?

Joe Biden.

Which candidate has the temperament to see us through this difficult crisis?

Joe Biden. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1312476154234720259/img/eR0GYFuz1sKiLtR2.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312476154234720259/vid/480x270/G3nS5SLgAwGldVqK.mp4?tag=13

It doesn’t matter if you are an essential worker at a supermarket, a bus driver, or president of the United States. Each and every one of us is vulnerable to this pandemic. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1312474588417155073/img/QThur09OX6shC6FJ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312474588417155073/vid/480x270/53vQpzw3N0O6s6E4.mp4?tag=13

Together, we can elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris as our next president and vice president, and create a government and economy that work for working people. Join me live in Lebanon, NH now: https://www.pscp.tv/w/ckdxJTMyNzU3OTl8MU93eFdMTG55TFZLUfnRYzdKcVFAyMYO7pqnYS4gkMzMSVcdkOhhf0CAVQkk

RT @cspan Senator Bernie Sanders Campaigns for Joe Biden in New Hampshire - LIVE at 3pm ET on C-SPAN https://www.c-span.org/video/?476591-1/senator-bernie-sanders-campaigns-joe-biden-hampshire http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjadpXxXYAQRY4b.jpg

We need an economy that works for all, and not just the few. That means millions of new jobs, higher wages, equal pay for equal work and a tax system that is fair. That's what I will be talking about today as I campaign for Joe Biden in New Hampshire.

That’s if the GOP can even sustain a quorum.

If not, Dems can call roll and potentially delay proceedings - and we should.

We shouldn’t give McConnell an inch. Every minute matters. https://twitter.com/MSNBC/status/1312427973170147328 QT @MSNBC BREAKING: Senate Majority Leader McConnell says he will move to halt Senate floor activity until Oct. 19, but will permit cmtes. to continue with their work, including the Senate Judiciary Cmte.'s confirmation hearings for Amy Coney Barrett’s nomination to the US Supreme Court.
RT @RBReich Shh don’t tell the Republicans, but at Walter Reed they have socialized medicine.

Access to health care should be a right and not just a privilege for those who can afford it. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjcU0mEWsAEFV-W.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312538922287853568/vid/320x320/Rh7OA8RW3r4eLmVq.mp4?tag=13

Our campaign is powered by the people — grassroots donors chipping in $5 and $25 at a time. Join our grassroots fundraising team today and we’ll give you your own custom fundraising link to encourage your friends and family to donate to the campaign.
https://joebiden.com/join-our-grassroots-fundraising-team/

.@BarackObama, @michaelb4jordan, and I have made a plan to vote. What’s your plan? http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjcCLueXYAU50Qo.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312518848176951296/vid/480x270/2hfH8qzusvJgN3J3.mp4?tag=13

Today is a great day to make a plan to vote. Write down when you will vote, where you will vote, and how you will vote—whether that’s by mail, drop-box, or safely in-person. Then, follow your plan.

And if you’re not registered yet, go to http://iwillvote.com now.
This is the place. Happy to be in the beautiful state of Utah and start the day with former State Senator Scott Howell. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjbXU74XgAEzs5E.jpg
The threat of this virus is real for all of us. Let it be a reminder that we must remain vigilant and take care of ourselves and take care of each other.

RT @JoeBiden Be a patriot. Do your part.

Wearing a mask will protect you. But it will also protect those around you — your mom, your dad, your son, your daughter, your neighbor, your co-worker.

Don’t just do it for yourself. Do it for the people you love.
One month. Let’s give it our all.
RT @davidharsanyi Marilyn vos Savant gets it. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjcBA1NXYAA03xx.jpg

That starts with making sure you and your friends and family are registered to vote. Get your application in before Monday: https://www.votetexas.gov/mobile/register/index.htm #TX21 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1312442876303998987/pu/img/BXOgxVHGi4Qhc5OQ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1312442876303998987/pu/vid/480x270/5zbaTOGwXO6pIUtG.mp4?tag=10

RT @chiproytx TEXANS: In order to #StandUpForAmerica at the ballot box, you MUST be registered to vote!

If you're not registered, your application must be POSTMARKED or RECEIVED by Monday, October 5th:  https://www.votetexas.gov/register/index.html #TX21 #KeepTexasRed cc @TexasGOP http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjZ3BN_XkAAgEZr.jpg

Our communities shouldn’t have to wait any longer. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EjaBFzrXkAEi26q.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1312375644660158470/vid/480x270/G-KqHcBDD8Nxkdxp.mp4?tag=13

A significant increase in conspiracy theories & outrageous claims since the President’s diagnosis

Lies spread much faster than fact checking

This is why we need frequent,detailed & transparent updates from @WhiteHouse 

And why we should all be skeptical of outlandish rumors

if then my people, upon whom my name has been pronounced, humble themselves and pray, and seek my face and turn from their evil ways, I will hear them from heaven and pardon their sins and heal their land.
